text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon leads with four horse lengths! 
Surely she will win this race!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon is still ahead! She held on for 2400m 
and finishes first! Six races and all six won! 
She's undefeated now one more crown to go!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower finished 2nd in the Nippon Derby. 
Despite failing to defeat Mihono Bourbon, she made 
incredible progress in the run-up to the race

A few days after the race, I find myself 
at a certain theme park in Chiba prefecture...
Whoa! This must be that well-known theme park! With the princess who lives in the castle, and the Big Lightning Mountain!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
I wanted to take her to the theme park she'd been wanting 
to go to, as a reward for her hard work. Although...

Wow, it's a lot less busy than I expected. 
Hehe, we're lucky today!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer... She really believes we're at that theme park...
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Whilst looking at the extatic Rice Shower, 
Mejiro McQueen whispers into my ear.

I know you are tight on money this month, 
but really? A different park?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: I, well...
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: I, well...
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Come on, McQueen! Word is that there's a secret 
underground attraction. We gotta check if it's real!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Hold on! That's the employee entrance, you doofus!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Come, Trainer! Let's go!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: Ah, yes...
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
And so, several hours passed in the blink of an eye 
at the fun (?) theme park.

We managed to ride on pretty much every attraction! 
I'm glad there were so few people here today.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Seeing her so happy in her ignorance... 
I feel so guilty.
Um... Trainer...
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
I still wanted to ride in the ferris wheel... 
Would you... join me?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
...So guilty, I could almost vomit! 
Of course, I can't decline her request 
if it makes her happy.
Ehehe... Hooray.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
